amendment.description: To amend the deficit-neutral reserve fund for tax relief to provide tax relief for low and middle income families.

vote.text: Amendment SA 439 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 52.

action.text: Amendment SA 439 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S2130-2134; text: CR S2131) To amend the deficit-neutral reserve fund for tax relief to provide tax relief for low and middle income families.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 439 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 52.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 439 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 52.
